account.title: Account information
account.description: We will use this contact information to contact you. For the security of your account, it is recommended to update your password regularly.

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Please enter the name of the contact person

mobile.label: Contact Details
mobile.placeholder: Please enter the mobile phone number used for contact

tel.label: Contact number
tel.placeholder: Please enter the phone number for contact

password.label: new password
password.error: The password must be 6 or more alphanumeric characters

confirm-password.label: Please re-enter new password
confirm-password.error: The two passwords are not the same

plan.title: My plan
plan.description-1: You can choose the most suitable service plan for your store
plan.contact-consultant: If you need to change the plan, please contact your store consultant to customize the exclusive plan for you.
plan.free-trial: Free trial will expire in 15 days
